name: Air Hockey 3D Real Pro
description:
Air Hockey 3D Real Pro is a high realistic simulator of air hockey for Android. It contains high quality graphics, 3D environment and a variety of real air hockey tables to choose from. Enjoy the most authentic and realistic experience of air hockey now in your android tablet or smartphone.

Features:

- Realistic physics
- Full HD graphics
- 3D environments
- Advanced AI movements with 4 levels of difficulty
- 3 camera positions in game
- 3 starting tables and 5 more to unlock
- 2 player mode on the same device
- over 14 game types
- Vibration on goal
- New 8 events


*** This is the Pro version of Air hockey 3D Real that contains no ads.

NOTICE : The game contains realistic physics so it might have low FPS on some low-spec devices (512 ram or less)
